comment: Easy Teacher and did miss most of the semester, however, when he was there he taught really well and was helpful and probably one of the easiest A's of my entire college carrer.

The professor was absent more often than present (we had less than 10 meetings) this was for a two day a week class! due to him being absent he wasn't able to teach us anything. He graded the class based on attendance and homework submission. (not completion or correctness)
Had his online STS class.  He was out sick most of the semester so he curbed some of the assignments.  Overall, great professor. I'd recommend him.
Easy class, all you had to do was do the writings twice a week, and it was a guaranteed "A". If you dont do the work thats the only way you will fail, everyone should take this easy class.

I was very impressed with this professor and how knowledgeable he was about.. everything. While I didn't like the class, Harbort is an excellent teacher. He has some hearing issues so sometimes answering questions can be a burden. Overall great teacher.
a very good professor. has him for STS and he kept the class very interesting and fun. we always got out early and had an easy final exam. he is a really cool guy.

Hitchickers guide to SPSU. We started after midsemester (late). The class had some work involved for just one credit hour. The class was hard to stay away from the class, enjoyable online experie. Bob Harbort tryed to help his students learn as best he could. He enjoys teaching you can tell. Take his class, and read his many comments and lsomethin.
Difficult to get an initial feel for him, but if you give him a chance, he is willing to do a lot to help you succeed. Very very very knowledgeable.
Excellent
The best professor. He's much more than a professor. He's a great mentor and friend.

I love this guy! I actually tried to figure out how to take more courses from him, despite the fact that I have absolutely NO interest in computer science, and it has no real bearing on my major. I just took the course because I needed the hours. I learned quite a lot, and would recommend his courses to anyone who enjoys learning.
Reminds me of Merlin or Gandolf.  We'd always do wizards jokes about him.  But he knows his stuff, and is very informative and easy to understand.
Straight forward grading. Interesting topics.
He is one of the best professors at SPSU.  Take him!

Excellent professor. Very interesting class. Put alot of work on you for such a small class, but grades very liberly and curves alot. Just participate in class discussions and SPEAK UP, he can't hear very well.
Knows his stuff.  Easiest professor on campus by far.  Likes discussions more than work.  Very flexible and likes to stay on current topis in the computer world.
He's a cool guy when you get to know him!
I call him the black hole.  You can give him info, but you get nothing back.
Boring, borin, boring
Sorta tough grading.  Big on class discussions and can be extremely boring.
